item.title: The second field study has been conducted

item.title: Field verification survey has been conducted.
item.description: A field survey of deforestation was conducted in late October 2021. This was to confirm the results of deforestation detection by JJ-FAST

item.title: The project activity was introduced on The Asahi Shimbun

item.title: The Project started !!
item.description: The Project kick-off meeting has been held on 21st Jul 2021 at IBAMA. At the meeting, the project members reconfirmed the Project purpose,
